commentaries.commentary: Dier goes into the book in what is the first yellow card of the game.
Kane is desperate to catch Liverpool's Salah in the race for the Golden Boot, but he won't do it like that - the England man has just hammered a wild shot from the range well off target.
Now Alli gets a booking as he checks Sterling and the visitors have a free-kick.
AND THERE IS THE GOAL! No mistake from Kane, as - after initially missing Son's cross - he gets back up off the terf to cushion in Tripper's pinpoint cut-back.
SAVE! Sanchez curls a free kick towards the left-hand corner, but Lloris reacts quickly to jump to his right and make the stop.

Pochettino's bravery has paid off. He kept two up top, even though Moura was about to go off a few minutes ago, Tottenham's strike duo combined there brilliantly - Kane carving through United's shambolic lines with a neat pass, and Moura doing the rest.
Dier goes into the book in what is the first yellow card of the game.
Kane is desperate to catch Liverpool's Salah in the race for the Golden Boot, but he won't do it like that - the England man has just hammered a wild shot from the range well off target.
Now Alli gets a booking as he checks Sterling and the visitors have a free-kick.
AND THERE IS THE GOAL! No mistake from Kane, as - after initially missing Son's cross - he gets back up off the terf to cushion in Tripper's pinpoint cut-back.
